name: MineCraftMine
description:
A game made in 72 Hours for Ludum Dare 50

Mining and crafting meets tower defense.

Control your little dude to gather resources and build defenses

Controls

WASD or Arrow keys to move

Mouse Left Click / 'B' to Mine

Mouse Right click / 'N' once to see placement of item (landmine/ Ballisata/WoodBlocker) from hot bar, press again to place.

For Ballista while viewing placment you can rotate them with E or H

1,2,3 as hot keys to select items from hot bar.

Hit 'C' to bring up the crafting window
